item.guid: 16 games now available on Nintendo Classics
item.title: 16 games now available on Nintendo Classics
item.description: 3D Tetris (Virtual Boy), Galactic Pinball (Virtual Boy), Golf (Virtual Boy), The Mansion of Innsmouth (Virtual Boy), Red Alarm (Virtual Boy), Teleroboxer (Virtual Boy), Virtual Boy Wario Land (Virtual Boy), Jack Bros. (Virtual Boy), Mario Clash (Virtual Boy), Mario's Tennis (Virtual Boy), Space Invaders Virtual Collection (Virtual Boy), V-Tetris (Virtual Boy), Vertical Force (Virtual Boy), Virtual Bowling (Virtual Boy), Virtual Fishing (Virtual Boy), and Zero Racers (Virtual Boy) are now available on Nintendo Classics
